name: One Microban level
description:
A puzzle game with ony one level, but with a LOT of variations. Kind of like "This is the only level".

Controls :

Arrow keys - Move
X - Do nothing
Z - Undo / R - Restart

Source code :

https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=2ba817426abc9fcbe9b9980fc4c02519

Music credits :

Me and the key 2 main theme by Bart Bonte. (special thanks to Breshii on Youtube for the video with the music)
